title: Tata Motors reveals Curvv EV. Here's all you need to know about the upcoming SUV coupé
description: Tata Motors will soon launch the Curvv EV, boasting a 400-500 km range, dual-motor setup, and design elements from the Harrier, including a tall bumper and wide air dam. It’s priced above Nexon EV, which has a 30.2 kWh battery pack. Tata currently sells the Tiago EV, Punch EV, and Tigor EV, with ICE models following.
